Installation

Prerequisites

  • Node.js 16+
  • npm 7+

Check your versions:

node --version
npm --version

Quick Install 

# Create a new blog
npx zeno-blog init my-blog
cd my-blog

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Build and serve
zeno build
zeno serve

Your blog is now running at http://localhost:3000! üéâ

Alternative Methods

Global Installation

# Install globally
npm install -g zeno-blog

# Create blog
zeno init my-blog
cd my-blog
npm install

From Source

# Clone and setup
git clone https://github.com/mine3krish/zeno
cd zeno-blog
npm install
npm link

Platform Setup

Windows

# Install Node.js from nodejs.org
# Then run:
npx zeno-blog init my-blog

macOS

# Using Homebrew
brew install node
npx zeno-blog init my-blog

Linux

# Ubuntu/Debian
sudo apt install nodejs npm
npx zeno-blog init my-blog

# Using nvm (recommended)
curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.39.0/install.sh | bash
nvm install --lts
npx zeno-blog init my-blog

Troubleshooting

Permission Issues

# Fix npm permissions (macOS/Linux)
sudo chown -R $(whoami) ~/.npm

Node Version Issues

# Update Node.js
npm install -g n
n latest

Path Issues

# Add to PATH (Linux/macOS)
echo 'export PATH=$PATH:~/.npm-global/bin' >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc
